Paystack

Engage integrates with Paystack to sync your customer data and track customer payment events.

To connect your Paystack account,

  • Visit the Integrations page of your Engage dashboard and click on Paystack
  • Enter your Paystack live secret keys.
  • Login to your Paystack dashboard
  • Navigate to the Settings page on your dashboard
  • Confirm the Live Webhook URL field is empty. If it is, set the value to
  • If the field is not empty, your developer will need to update the existing webhook script to use the necessary events but also directly send the events from Paystack to https://api.engage.so/webhooks/paystack/
  • If you need more help, we will be glad to help with concierge integration. Please send a mail to hello@engage.so
  • Once done, click the Save Changes button
